title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
OB: When switching perspectives in the software, the view maximized state is lost.
EB: The software should retain the maximized state of views when switching perspectives.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open any perspective in the software. 2. Maximize a view within the perspective. 3. Switch to a different perspective. The maximized state of the view should be lost.
